title: Update welcome text and header logo with uploaded image

requirements.text: Update the h2 element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1]) to display 'Welcome back, [Their User]!' where [Their User] is replaced with the authenticated user's display name

quotes: The "h2 usjako" text should say "Wecome back, [Their User]!"

acceptanceCriteria: The h2 element displays 'Welcome back, ' followed by the user's display name and an exclamation mark
The display name is dynamically retrieved from the authenticated user's profile
If no user is authenticated, an appropriate fallback is shown

requirements.text: Replace the img element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]) source with the uploaded image (image.png), storing it as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/

quotes: "img 1y3o7ot" should be the image I uploaded (image.png)

acceptanceCriteria: The header logo img element displays the uploaded image.png
The image is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/image.png
The img src attribute points to the correct asset path
The image maintains appropriate dimensions for the header logo

constraints: Do not modify the SiteHeader component structure beyond updating the img src attribute
Preserve existing authentication logic when retrieving user display name
nonGoals: Changing the overall header layout or styling
Modifying other elements not specified by the XPath selections
Adding additional user information beyond display name in the welcome message
